item.description:
Specific Topic: Belief Change Work

Let's talk about belief change and how it can be facilitated with NLP techniques.

Do you have some limiting beliefs that you would like to change?

I can't do this.; I don't deserve this.; This always happens to me. ...

Do you have some beliefs you would like to create for yourself?

I am able to do this.  I do deserve this. ...

 

Come learn how you can re-shape some of those beliefs.

Come Learn and Play!!

Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.

Kevin Martin

(978) 494-4542
kenda_assoc@msn.com
www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: NLP Meetup - Natick - NLP - Belief Change Work
